sources.organisation: Department of Industry, Energy Transition and Sustainability

objetivo_global: 9- Build resilient infrastructure, promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and foster innovation
meta_global: 9.4 By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities
formula:
$$TVECO2_{2005}^{t} = \frac{ECO2^{t}-ECO2^{2005}}{ECO2^{2005}} $$

where:

$ECO2^{t} =$ CO2 emissions in year $t$

$ECO2^{2005} =$ CO2 emissions in year 2005
texto_oceca: Indicator calculated using a methodology harmonised across the central statistical bodies of the autonomous communities

es.objetivo_global: 9- Build resilient infrastructure, promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and foster innovation
es.meta_global: 9.4 By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities
es.definicion: Tasa de variación de las emisiones de CO2 respecto a las emitidas en el año 2005
es.formula:
$$TVECO2_{2005}^{t} = \frac{ECO2^{t}-ECO2^{2005}}{ECO2^{2005}} $$

donde:

$ECO2^{t} =$ emisiones de $CO_2$ en el año $t$

$ECO2^{2005} =$ emisiones de $CO_2$ en el año 2005
es.texto_oceca: Indicator calculated using a methodology harmonised across the central statistical bodies of the autonomous communities
